parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided text.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>True. The post explicitly mentions and encourages voting for ANC (Alianța Național Creștină) for the Romanian Parliament and Cǎlin Georgescu for the Presidency of Romania.  This directly refers to specific candidates participating in the elections, fulfilling "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid Facebook advertisement targeting a wide audience in Bucharest and surrounding areas, clearly intending to reach more than just a few individuals.  The use of Facebook as a platform and the paid nature of the post further supports this.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>True. The primary objective of the post is to influence voters in Bucharest to support ANC in the parliamentary elections and Cǎlin Georgescu in the presidential election. The call to "concentrate votes" and the emphasis on the importance of each vote clearly demonstrates an intention to sway electoral outcomes, fulfilling "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>False. While the post presents information, it lacks the objectivity and neutrality expected of journalistic reporting.  It's a clear appeal for votes, not an unbiased presentation of facts or analysis.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. The post does not express a personal opinion; instead, it's a direct and forceful call to action, urging voters to support specific candidates. The language used is not that of personal reflection but of political campaigning.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>435262922971000</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, identified by ad_archive_id 435262922971000, constitutes electoral propaganda.  It directly promotes specific candidates (ANC for Parliament and Cǎlin Georgescu for Presidency) and explicitly urges voters to support them. The paid nature of the post, its wide reach, and its clear objective to influence voting behavior all point towards a violation of Article 98 t).  The post's content goes beyond informing the public; it actively campaigns for specific candidates.  The argument that it's simply expressing an opinion is weak, given the direct call to action and the targeting of a large audience.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>ANC</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>Cǎlin Georgescu</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>FreeInfo</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
FreeInfo, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări pe Facebook (ID 435262922971000) care constituie propagandă electorală, îndemnând la votarea Alianței Naționale Creștine (ANC) pentru Parlamentul României și a lui Cǎlin Georgescu pentru Președinția României. Postarea, având un caracter explicit de campanie electorală, se adresează unui public larg din București și împrejurimi, având ca efect electoral influențarea voturilor în favoarea candidaților menționați.  Textul postării, care conține îndemnuri directe precum „concentrați voturile către ANC” și „susțineți pe Cǎlin Georgescu”, demonstrează clar intenția de a influența rezultatul alegerilor, încălcând astfel prevederile legale.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
